main event: A civilian sighted a disc-shaped object with a glow on top and an antenna near Springfield, Ohio on February 28, 1969.
interesting points: The object was observed to glow brightly on top while an antenna was visible., The observer estimated the object was about 30 feet away and traveled at speeds between 300 to 600 MPH., The observer felt a vibration accompanied by a humming noise during the sighting., The sighting duration was not explicitly provided but involved an unexpected disappearance., There were additional reports of similar sightings in the vicinity shortly after this observation.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with a glow and an antenna
witness description: The witness was a civilian, a business assistant, with no prior experience of observing similar phenomena.
